name: FP News Scroller
author: Moshiur Rahman Mehedi

sections.description:
FP News Scroller allows you to display news/post from a specific category or from all category in a widget position with with infinity scroll effects. The scrolling options/parametrs/controls are managable from wordpress admin area. You can also assign the category and the post limit.

** Fully Responsive

You can control over your news scroller’s scrolling transition effect, time, direction etc.

Plugin Settings

  • Category ID – textbox
  • Post Limit – Options
  • Direction – Options
  • Speed – textbox (pixels per second)
  • Moving – Options (weather to start the ticker in a moving or static position)
  • startEmpty – Options (weather to start with an empty or pre-filled ticker)
  • duplicate – Options (if there is less items then visible on the ticker you can duplicate the items to make it continuous)
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Download the plugin file to your computer and Unzip the downloaded archive
  2. Upload the folder fp-news-scroller to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin from Plugins > FP News Scroller > Activate, under WordPress admin interface
  4. Manage Widget Settings.
sections.faq:
1. What is Speed?
    Answer: The speed of the scroller.

  2. What is Direction?
    Answer: if to move left or right.

  3. What is moving?
    Answer: weather to start the ticker in a moving or static position.

  4. What is startEmpty?
    Answer: weather to start with an empty or pre-filled ticker.

  5. What is duplicate?
    Answer: if there is less items then visible on the ticker you can duplicate the items to make it continuous.

  6. Is it Responsive?
    Answer: Yes, it is.
